name: DongSheng Luo
content: Dongsheng Luo Short Bio I am an assistant professor at Florida International University. I obtained my doctoral degree at the College of Information Science and Technology, Pennsylvania State University, supervised by Prof. Xiang Zhang in 2022 and my B.Eng degree in computer science and technology from Beihang University in 2017. Research Interests Trustworthy AI : Explainable AI, Robust AI, Physical-Aware AI Data/Label Efficient AI: Self-Supervised Learning, Fast Domain Adaptation, Model Compression/ Automatic Feature Selection Multi-Source, Multi-Modality Machine Learning: Federated Learning,Multi-Domain Analysis Data Mining : Time Series, Graph Neural Network, Spatiotemporal Data Analysis For more details, visit our lab website FIU Trustworthy AI Lab Ph.D. Students Xu Zheng (Spring 2023-): ICLR 2025,ICML 2024b, ICLR 2024a, ICLR 2024b, EuroS&PW 2023 Zhuomin Chen (Fall 2023-): ICLR 2025, NeurIPS 24, ICML 2024a, ICML 2024b, ICLR 2024b Selected Publications Google Scholar Recent Workshop/Preprints GitTemporalAI: Leveraging Temporal Knowledge Graphs and LLMs for Multi-Agent Repository Intelligence Dongsheng Luo, Raju Rangaswami, Amir Rahmati, Erez Zadok The First MARW: Multi-Agent AI in the Real World Workshop at AAAI 2025 Explanation-Preserving Augmentation for Semi-Supervised Graph Representation Learning Zhuomin Chen, Jingchao Ni, Hojat Allah Salehi, Xu Zheng, Esteban Schafir, Farhad Shirani, Dongsheng Luo PAC Learnability under Explanation-Preserving Graph Perturbations Xu Zheng, Farhad Shirani, T.
